author: Reuters Editorial
title: CORRECTED-BRIEF-Kasikornbank Revises Non-Interest Income Forecast To Fall 6-8 percent
text:
(Corrects bank forecast to show range in headline and first summary point, not 8 pct fall)
April 4 (Reuters) - Kasikornbank PCL:
* REVISES FORECAST FOR NON-INTEREST INCOME TO FALL OF 6-8 PERCENT IN 2018
* KBANK shares down 4.7 pct after announcement Further company coverage: (Reporting by Chayut Setboonsarng)
